About.title: About Us
About.description: We are a Media agency helping our clients with Digital Marketing, Videography & Photography, Web & App Development, Graphic Design, and Animation. We have a wide range of experience that we happily share.
About.paragraph1: ServixerSpace works on the concept that high quality is the way to viewers' hearts. And the company has therefore secured some of the industry's best and most skilled people on the team.
About.list1: Our passion is to create independent digital solutions that help our clients achieve their goals.
About.list2: Our competencies are strategy, consulting, and analysis as well as digital development, design, and filmmaking.
About.list3: Our ambition is to create safe and transparent collaborations built on value creation and trust.
About.quote: As a customer at ServixerSpace, you must experience quality and trust from the first meeting and throughout the entire collaboration. We have an analytical approach â€“ and win over customers because we understand their business and their challenges.

Faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about working with us.
Faq.q1Title: How long does a typical project take?
Faq.q1Desc: Timeline depends on the complexity of the project. A standard website typically takes 4-6 weeks, while more complex apps or software can take 3-6 months. We provide a detailed timeline during the discovery phase.
Faq.q2Desc: We offer both fixed-price project quotes and hourly rate agreements, depending on what suits your needs best. We believe in transparency, so there are no hidden fees.
Faq.q3Desc: Absolutely. We offer various maintenance packages to ensure your digital product remains secure, up-to-date, and optimized after launch.
Faq.q4Desc: Yes! We are a full-service agency. We can handle everything from logo design and brand identity to SEO, social media marketing, and content strategy.

web.title: Web Design & Development
web.subtitle: We create tailored, high-converting websites using the latest technologies like React and Next.js, combined with stunning, user-centric design.
web.description: We donâ€™t just build websites; we craft digital experiences. By merging professional web design with robust development, we ensure your site is not only beautiful but also fast, secure, and scalable. Whether you need a simple landing page or a complex corporate portal, we cover both the visual and technical aspects seamlessly.

features.title: Custom Design
features.desc: Unique layouts designed specifically for your brand identity, never generic templates.

features.title: High Performance
features.desc: Built on modern frameworks for lightning-fast load times and SEO advantage.

features.title: Responsive & Mobile-First
features.desc: Flawless experience across all devices, from desktop monitors to smartphones.

process.title: Launch & Support

marketing.subtitle: A comprehensive approach to online visibility. We combine data-driven SEO strategies with effective Social Media Management to grow your business.

We don't just get you traffic; we get you the *right* traffic. From ranking #1 on Google to engaging audiences on Instagram and LinkedIn, we handle your entire digital footprint.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: At ServixerSpace, we are committed to protecting your privacy and handling your personal data in a transparent and secure manner. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information when you use our website or services.

1.title: 1. Information We Collect
1.content:
We may collect and process the following types of personal data:
â€¢ Name, email address, phone number
â€¢ Company name and project details (if provided)
â€¢ Messages and communications sent through contact forms or email
â€¢ Newsletter subscription information
â€¢ Technical data such as IP address, browser type, device information, and usage data

We only collect personal data that is necessary for legitimate business purposes.

2.title: 2. How We Collect Information
2.content:
We collect personal data when you:
â€¢ Contact us via forms, email, or phone
â€¢ Book a meeting or request a service
â€¢ Subscribe to our newsletter
â€¢ Interact with our website

Some technical data may be collected automatically through cookies and analytics tools.

3.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
3.content:
We use your personal data to:
â€¢ Provide and manage our services
â€¢ Communicate with you regarding inquiries or projects
â€¢ Improve our website, services, and user experience
â€¢ Send relevant updates, offers, or newsletters (only if you consent)
â€¢ Ensure security and prevent fraud

We process your data based on legitimate interest, contractual necessity, or your consent, in accordance with GDPR.

4.title: 4. Sharing of Information
4.content:
We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal data.

Your data may only be shared with:
â€¢ Trusted service providers (hosting, email, analytics)
â€¢ Legal or regulatory authorities if required by law

All third parties are required to comply with data protection regulations.

5.title: 5. Data Storage and Security
5.content:
We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

Your personal data is stored only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy or as required by law.

6.title: 6. Cookies
6.content:
Our website may use cookies to enhance user experience and analyze website performance.

You can manage or disable cookies through your browser settings. Continued use of our website implies consent to our cookie usage.

7.title: 7. Your Data Protection Rights (GDPR)
7.content:
As an EU resident, you have the right to:
â€¢ Access your personal data
â€¢ Request correction or deletion of your data
â€¢ Restrict or object to data processing
â€¢ Withdraw consent at any time
â€¢ Request data portability
â€¢ Lodge a complaint with a data protection authority

To exercise these rights, please contact us using the details below.

8.title: 8. Third-Party Links
8.content: Our website may contain links to external websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of third-party sites.

9.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
9.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

10.title: 10. Contact Information
10.content:
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or how we process your personal data, please contact us:

ServixerSpace
Skibhusvej 109
5000 Odense, Denmark

Cookies.title: Cookies Policy
Cookies.intro: This Cookies Policy explains how ServixerSpace uses cookies and similar technologies when you visit our website.

1.title: What Are Cookies?
1.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help improve functionality, performance, and user experience.

2.title: How We Use Cookies
2.content:
We use cookies to:
â€¢ Ensure the website functions properly
â€¢ Analyze website traffic and performance
â€¢ Improve user experience and content
â€¢ Remember user preferences

3.title: Types of Cookies We Use
3.content:
â€¢ Essential Cookies: Required for basic website functionality
â€¢ Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how visitors use our website
â€¢ Preference Cookies: Remember your settings and preferences

4.title: Managing Cookies
4.content:
You can control or disable cookies through your browser settings. Please note that disabling cookies may affect website functionality.

By continuing to use our website, you consent to our use of cookies.

CaseStudies.title: Case Studies
CaseStudies.subtitle: Our Impact in Numbers & Stories
CaseStudies.description: See how we've helped businesses transform their digital presence and achieve measurable ROI.

1.title: Authentic Digital Experience
1.problem: A beloved local ice cream shop lacking a digital presence to match their premium authentic quality.
1.solution: Developed a high-performance Gatsby site with Contentful CMS, featuring rich visuals and an immersive brand story.
1.result: Established a strong online brand identity and significantly increased foot traffic and catering inquiries.

2.title: Business Management Platform
2.problem: Businesses struggling with fragmented tools for management, leading to inefficiency and data silos.
2.solution: Built a comprehensive management platform using Vue.js and Laravel, integrating multiple business functions into one intuitive interface.
2.result: Streamlined operations for users, reducing administrative time by 40% and improving data accessibility.

3.title: All-in-One Travel Ecosystem
3.problem: Travelers struggle with fragmented planning tools, while businesses lack a diverse platform to reach them directly.
3.solution: Developed a scalable ecosystem with integrated Admin, User, and B2B systems for seamless planning and direct sales.
3.result: Simplified user planning, unlocked B2B sales channels, and enabled centralized platform management.

4.title: Urban Mobility Super App
4.problem: Urban users rely on multiple disconnected apps for transportation, food delivery, and courier servicesâ€”leading to friction and inefficiency.
4.solution: Designed and developed a modern super-app bringing rides, food, and delivery into one seamless ecosystem with dedicated User, Driver, and Merchant systems.
4.result: Simplified urban life for users, created new income for drivers, and enabled scalable digital growth for local businesses.
